name: GetWebinarAbsentees
description:
Retrieve a list of absentees from a Zoom webinar.

This tool lists absentees of a specific Zoom webinar. It requires a Pro or higher plan with a Webinar add-on. Use this tool to find out who did not attend a past webinar.

parameters.name: webinar_id_or_uuid
parameters.description: The webinar's ID or UUID. If using a UUID starting with '/' or containing '//', double encode it.

value_schema.description:
The webinar's ID or universally unique ID (UUID). 
* If you provide a webinar ID, the API will return a response for the latest webinar instance. 
* If you provide a webinar UUID that begins with a `/` character or contains the `//` characters, you **must** [double encode](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/using-zoom-apis/#meeting-id-and-uuid) the webinar UUID before making an API request.

parameters.name: webinar_occurrence_id
parameters.description: The ID of the specific webinar occurrence to retrieve absentees for.

value_schema.description: The meeting or webinar occurrence ID.

parameters.name: number_of_records_per_call
parameters.description: The number of records to return in a single API call.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: pagination_next_page_token
parameters.description: Token for pagination to access the next set of results. Expires in 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: occurrence_id
parameters.description: The meeting or webinar occurrence ID.

value_schema.description: The meeting or webinar occurrence ID.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

parameters.description:
The webinar's ID or universally unique ID (UUID). 
* If you provide a webinar ID, the API will return a response for the latest webinar instance. 
* If you provide a webinar UUID that begins with a `/` character or contains the `//` characters, you **must** [double encode](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/using-zoom-apis/#meeting-id-and-uuid) the webinar UUID before making an API request.

* If you provide a webinar UUID that begins with a `/` character or contains the `//` characters, you **must** [double encode](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/using-zoom-apis/#meeting-id-and-uuid) the webinar UUID before making an API request.
